Translations.Text: Ur telli tiyta degsent af ibabaten nnsent, arraw nnsent, atmaten nnsent, arraw n wamaten nnsent, arraw n tsetmatin nnsent, tilawin nnsent, ticrikin nnsent. Ad êezzbent i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, d Anagi n yal cci
Öebbi akked lmalayek iS, s tidep, Nuban $ef Nnbi. A wid iumnen! Nubet fellas, ternum as azul aêmayan
Ih, wid ijjerin Öebbi akked Umazan iS, Ixza ten Öebbi, di ddunit, di laxeôt. Ihegga yasen d aâaqeb isdullun
Wid ijjerin lmumnin, argaz tameîîut, $ef wayen ur ksiben, ni$ bbwin acehrir akked ubekkav n ûûeê
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik, i iss ik, i tlawin n lmumnin, ad jemâant ijufaô nnsent. Ppif akka, a tent âaqlen, ur tent pooerin. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ma ur êbisen ara ixabiten, imehzulen n wul, akked wid ipxeôôiven di Lmadina, ad ak Nebges $uôsen. Sinna, siwa cwiî n tallit ara yilin, degs, d loiran ik
Ad pwaxzun anda ten nufan, ad pwaîîfen, ad pwan$en akw
D tannumi n Öebbi ar wid iâaddan zik. Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel, di tannumi n Öebbi
